schema.name: Tortang Dulong

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Silverfish under cold water until the water runs clear and let it drain.
Finely chop the 15 grams of onion and mince the 10 grams of garlic.
In a large bowl, beat the 3 medium eggs until well combined.
Add the drained Silverfish, chopped onion, and minced garlic to the beaten eggs, gently stirring to ensure everything is evenly mixed.
Preheat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly oil it.
Spoon the Silverfish and egg mixture into the skillet, forming small patties. Cook each side for about 3-4 minutes or until golden and cooked through.

schema.description: Tortang Dulong is a high-protein, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar take on a classic Filipino dish. Perfect for those looking for healthier yet satisfying meal options, the recipe transforms silverfish into a nutritious delight. This approach aligns with the Healthified and Healthy Recipes trend, ensuring a delicious way to maintain a balanced diet.
